00008 namespace CALICE {
00009 
00010   class ClusterShapesTyped {
00011 
00012   public:
00013     ClusterShapesTyped( ) : _shapes(0), _shapesPointer(&_shapes) {
00014     }
00015 
00016     virtual ~ClusterShapesTyped() {
00017       if (_shapes) delete _shapes;
00018     }
00019 
00020     template <class T>
00021     void fill(const lcio::LCCollection *col);
00022 
00023     ClusterShapes *getClusterShapesPointer() {return _shapes;}
00024     ClusterShapes **getClusterShapesPointerPointer() {return _shapesPointer;}
00025 
00026   private:
00027 
00028     void generateShapes() {
00029       if (_shapes) delete _shapes;
00030       if (_aHit.size() > 0) _shapes = new ClusterShapes(_aHit.size(), &(_aHit[0]), &(_xHit[0]), &(_yHit[0]), &(_zHit[0]) );
00031       *_shapesPointer = _shapes;
00032     }
00033 
00034     ClusterShapes *_shapes;
00035     ClusterShapes **_shapesPointer;
00036 
00037     std::vector<float> _aHit;
00038     std::vector<float> _xHit;
00039     std::vector<float> _yHit;
00040     std::vector<float> _zHit;
00041 
00042   };
00043 
00044 } // end namepsace CALICE

00047 #include "EVENT/CalorimeterHit.h"

00049 namespace CALICE {
00050 
00051   template <class T>
00052   void ClusterShapesTyped::fill(const lcio::LCCollection *col) {
00053 
00054     for (int i = 0; i < col->getNumberOfElements(); ++i) {
00055       T* hit = dynamic_cast<T*>( col->getElementAt(i) );
00056 
00057       if (hit) {
00058         _aHit.push_back(hit->getEnergy() );
00059         _xHit.push_back( hit->getPosition()[0] );
00060         _yHit.push_back( hit->getPosition()[1] );
00061         _zHit.push_back( hit->getPosition()[2] );
00062       }
00063     }
00064 
00065     generateShapes();
00066   }
00067 
00068 
00069 } //end namespace CALICE
